name: Amethlion
description: Explore, craft and survive as you discover ancient secrets in this open world, action packed RPG adventure! An accidental discovery will leave you searching for clues, exploring forgotten places and unravelling the mysteries of a lost race all while fighting to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or greater Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+ Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
